unnormalised: Courier company, Delhivery, faced delivery delays across several pin codes in Mumbai following unexpected heavy rainfall on 17/07/2024. Affected areas include locations with postal codes 400001, 400002, and 400004, primarily in South Mumbai and areas around Nariman Point. Customers expecting deliveries to addresses such as “Office No. 10, Maker Chambers, Nariman Point, Mumbai, 400021” should anticipate a potential delay of 24-48 hours.
normalised: Courier company, Delhivery, faced delivery delays across several pin codes in Mumbai following unexpected heavy rainfall on seventeenth july two thousand and twenty four. Affected areas include locations with postal codes four hundred thousand one, four hundred thousand two, and four hundred thousand four, primarily in South Mumbai and areas around Nariman Point. Customers expecting deliveries to addresses such as “Office Number ten, Maker Chambers, Nariman Point, Mumbai, four hundred thousand twenty one” should anticipate a potential delay of twenty four to forty eight hours.

unnormalised: The company released a statement attributing the hold-up to logistical challenges. "Due to unforeseen weather conditions, our delivery personnel are facing difficulties accessing certain areas," stated a Delhivery spokesperson. Efforts are underway to reroute delivery vehicles and ensure packages reach their intended destinations as quickly as possible. The company has advised recipients at addresses like “Shop No. 5, Linking Road, Bandra, 400050” to contact customer support for real-time updates.
normalised: The company released a statement attributing the hold-up to logistical challenges. "Due to unforeseen weather conditions, our delivery personnel are facing difficulties accessing certain areas," stated a Delhivery spokesperson. Efforts are underway to reroute delivery vehicles and ensure packages reach their intended destinations as quickly as possible. The company has advised recipients at addresses like “Shop Number five, Linking Road, Bandra, four hundred thousand fifty” to contact customer support for real-time updates.

unnormalised: Delhivery's customer service team can be reached at help@delhivery.com or via their helpline number. The company is prioritising deliveries to essential service providers and hospitals located at addresses such as "AIIMS, Ansari Nagar, New Delhi, 110029". They expect services to normalize by 19/07/2024, weather permitting.
normalised: Delhivery's customer service team can be reached at help at delhivery dot com or via their helpline number. The company is prioritising deliveries to essential service providers and hospitals located at addresses such as "A-I-I-M-S, Ansari Nagar, New Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand twenty nine". They expect services to normalize by nineteenth july two thousand and twenty four, weather permitting.
